hanzi-su-wiki:
還

Значения

Возвращаться; возвращать

Мнемоника

Поворачиваясь 辶 перед зеркалом, одетый в парадный кринолин, император осматривает 罒 себя то с одной, то с другой стороны. Кринолин есть длинная одежда 衣 с высоким поясом 囗. Вращаться, возвращаться (в исходное положение).

Варианты

还

Все еще; все еще в процессе; еще больше; пока что; даже больше; Кроме того; весьма; сносно (хорошо); уже; четное; также; еще

huán
to pay back; to return
вернуть деньги; возвращаться
rtega_mnemonic:
還還RS
还还		return, come back, repay, yet, still
  • going ⻌ round 睘 one returns to the same place
  • ⓢ a person with spread arms 不 blocks the going ⻌: one has to return
  • ⓢ do not 不 walk 辶 if you still have to return

heisig_chinese_memo: You've probably guessed it by now, this is the road that Sam and Frodo take to give back the ring to Mount Doom!
heisig_constituent: send back, trampoline, eye, cross-eyed, net, one, ceiling, mouth, scarf, road
koohiiStory1: You´ve probably guessed it by now, this is the road that Sam and Frodo take to send back the ring to Mount Doom! (see previous frame, the jewel is replaced by the road).
koohiiStory2: Continued from ring (#836)....... So I´m on the road going to send back the ring minus the jewel, the hit to the floor knocked it out.
jp_example_words:
還元(かんげん): resolution, reduction, return to origins
還暦(かんれき): 60th birthday
返還(へんかん): return, restoration
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There's a scooter coming toward you with a net trapping a weird zombie on it. You don't want this here, so you decide to send back the zombie.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You want to send back this zombie the way it came. You definitely don't want it loose in your neighborhood.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you prepare to send back the zombie, you imagine yourself as Genghis Khan (かん). On your horse (it's just your own scooter) you stab forward with your spear (stick), swing the scooter the zombie is on, and send it back from whence it came!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You managed to send back the zombie, good for you! Genghis Khan would be proud.
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 込 (внутрь), 口 (рот), 買 (покупать), 衣 (одежда)

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: There is no road that will give back your time, but you can always turn around in the future.
origin_of_ch_char_book: Army commanders have to check many things constantly, such as weapons, supplies, food, and the morale. (師, 师, shi=shih, teacher) shows a small hill and the action of walking around the hill repeatedly (還, 还, huan;hai, return; still).
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle bone inscriptions from " Xing " from "目" to " fang ", Zhou Yuan Oracle bone inscriptions from "彳", "睘" sound, different from inscriptions on gold. Inscriptions from " Chuo ", " Qiong " sound, " Qiong " doubles as a pictogram, " Qiong " original meaning circular Bi, which have extended return to Italy, " Chuo " That walk, it is " also " have returned, The meaning of return. Bronze script has the same shape as Xiaozhuan and Jiansi.

The original meaning is return, return. "Said Wen": "Return, Fu Ye. Congruo, Suisheng." "Er Ya. "Explanation": "Return, restore, return." Xing Bing's note: "All return." "Guangya. Interpretation II": "Return, return." "Book of Songs. Xiaoya. "Who Ren Si": "You are still in, my heart is easy. If you are not in, it is difficult to know." Zheng Xuan's note: "Return, go back." These poems refer to you coming in to see me when you return, mine My heart rejoices; you come back but don't come to see me, no one knows the reason. Jin Tao Yuanming "Returning speech": "The bird is tired and flies and knows it." It means that when the bird is tired, it knows to fly back to its nest. This is the source of the idiom "the tired bird knows the return". The meaning of return is extended to return the object. "Zhou Li. Autumn official. "Master of Ceremony": "To the food, to return to Gui." Zheng Xuan's note quoted Zheng Sinong: "Return to Gui, to return to the jade." "Food" was a great gift for receiving guests when the ancient princes gave their betrothal gifts. Most of them were gifts of food. ; This sentence refers to accepting the food and returning the jade bi. It also means restoration and restoration. "History of Ming Dynasty. "Taizu Ji 2": "The official shall return to his post if he strikes by mistake." This means that if an official is dismissed because of a fault, the original official position shall be restored. It also means to return or retreat. "Historical Records. "Bonji of Gaozu": "It is to seal the treasures of Qin's treasure house and return it to the army." Said (Liu Bang) closed the valuable treasures and treasures of the Qin state and retreated the army to the overlord.

" Also ," also construed surround. Duan Yucai's comment on "Shuowen": "Hai, today people still use "Huan" around the word, but the ancient scriptures only use the word "Huan"." "Zuo Zhuan. "The Ten Years of Xianggong": "The division of the princes returned to Zheng and went south, as for Yangling." Du's note: "Return, go around." Refers to the princes' army marching southward around Zheng State and reaching Yangling. "Historical Records. "The Assassin's Biography": "Jing Ke chased the King of Qin, and the King of Qin went away on the pillar." That is, Jing Ke chased the King of Qin, who had to run away around the pillar. Resolved as rotation. "Han Shu. "The wrong biography of Yan Angpi": "If you persuade you to give a great reward, and a heavy punishment, you will die before you will not pay the heel." Yan Shi's ancient note: "Return, read the spin. Turn the heel, turn the foot." The sentence means that if you use generous rewards to persuade and deter with heavy punishments, you will not turn around and run away in the face of death.

" Hai " is also used as an adverb to indicate time and is equivalent to "immediately." "Xunzi. "Wang Ba": "If Yu and Shun return, Wang Ye will return." Wang Niansun "Xunzi Magazine": "Return, that is to come; return, that is to rise." This means that Yu and Shun came immediately , The emperor’s foundation immediately rose. It also means to continue, which is equivalent to "still." Tang Dufu "Fanjiang": "Play music in chaos, drift and listen to songs." It means that music is still played when the current situation is chaotic, and the fashion of drifting and drifting is listening to songs. It also expresses choice, which is equivalent to "still".

Oracle is used as the original meaning, "Compilation" 6349: "Working side pays back." It means that the workers of the working side are back.

Bronze text is used as the original meaning, Lu Xingtai: "Bai (Bo) Mao's father will march north, but he will return." It means that Bo Mao's father returned from an expedition to the north. Also used as surrounding righteousness. Sanshi Pan: "The road has one bong (seal) to the east, and one bong (seal) to the west." The road is bounded to the east, making a circle and then to the west. It is also used as a person's name, and Gun Huan Ding: "Gun Huan is used as a treasure to use the Ding." "Gun Huan" is the name of a person, which means that Gun has also cast a valuable Ding.

Warring States bamboo borrow " also " is " pregnant ." "Guodian Jane. Respect Virtue and Righteousness, Jan 25: "Governing the people is not just about repaying (conceiving) one's livelihood." "Containing one's livelihood" means being content with livelihood; this sentence refers to governing the people not just to make them livelihood.

Chinese silk book by " also " to " ring " is intended to surround the work. "Mawangdui. "Fifty-two sick prescriptions" line 101: "Take the mud from the well and seal the wound with the (ring)." That is, to surround the wound with the mud from the well.

Although " also " the word has long been found in inscriptions, but still more common Chinese silk book by " ring " to " also " used the original meaning. "Mawangdui Silk Book. "Chunqiu Shiyu" line 52: "Xiangongzhishi (division) attacked Guo (Guo) ring (return)." It means that Jin Xiangong's army returned after attacking Guoguo. Also used as transfer meaning. "Mawangdui Silk Book. "Warring States Political Strategists" line 278: "Yu (and) Yan is turned in, and the Qin disaster case is returned (returned) to Zhao Xi." It means that (Qin) and Yan have become friendly countries, and Qin has transferred the disaster To Zhao Guo.
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from " Xing " from "目" from " fang "; Bronze and Xiaozhuan from "辵", "睘" sound. The original meaning is to return and return. Later it was extended to return and restore. "Hai" is also often used as an adverb, which means immediately, still, and still.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「行」從「目」從「方」，周原甲骨文從「彳」，「睘」聲，與金文形異。金文從「辵」，「睘」聲，「睘」兼作形符，「睘」本義為圓形的玉璧，因而引申有歸回之意，「辵」即行走，故「還」有返回、歸還之意。金文與小篆、簡帛字形相同。

　　本義為返回、回歸。《說文》：「還，復也。从辵，睘聲。」《爾雅．釋言》：「還、復，返也。」邢昺注：「皆迴返也。」《廣雅．釋詁二》：「還，歸也。」《詩經．小雅．何人斯》：「爾還而入，我心易也。還而不入，否難知也。」鄭玄注：「還，行返也。」這幾句詩指你歸來時進來看我，我的心就歡喜了；你歸來但不來看我，原因沒有人知道。晉陶淵明〈歸去來辭〉：「鳥倦飛而知還。」意謂雀鳥困倦了就知道要飛回自己的巢。此為成語「倦鳥知還」的出處，用以比喻辭官後歸隱田園或從旅居之地返回故鄉。從返回義引申為交還物件。《周禮．秋官．司儀》：「致饔餼，還圭。」鄭玄注引鄭司農云：「還圭，歸其玉也。」「饔餼」是古代諸侯行聘禮時接待賓客的大禮，多為贈送食物；這句指接受了食物，交還玉璧。又引申為恢復、還原之意。《明史．太祖紀二》：「吏以過誤罷者還其職。」意指若官吏被以為有過錯而遭罷職，恢復原來的官職。亦引申有退回、後退之意。《史記．高祖本紀》：「乃封秦重寶財物府庫，還軍霸上。」表示（劉邦）於是封閉秦國的貴重寶物、財物府庫，把軍隊退到霸上駐紮。

　　「還」亦解作環繞。段玉裁注《說文》：「還，今人還繞字用『環』，古經傳祇用『還』字。」《左傳．襄公十年》：「諸侯之師還鄭而南，至於陽陵。」杜預注：「還，繞也。」指諸侯的軍隊圍繞鄭國向南前進，到達陽陵。《史記．刺客列傳》：「荊軻逐秦王，秦王還柱而走。」即荊軻追着秦王政，秦王政只得繞着柱子逃走。又解為旋轉。《漢書．爰盎鼂錯傳》：「如此而勸以厚賞，威以重罰，則前死不還踵矣。」顏師古注：「還，讀曰旋。旋踵，回旋其足也。」這句意謂這樣用厚賞勸導，以重罰威懾，那麼在死亡面前也不會轉身逃跑。

　　「還」又用作副詞，表示時間，相當於「立即」。《荀子．王霸》：「如是則禹舜還至，王業還起。」王念孫《荀子雜志》：「還至，即至也；還起，即起也。」意指如此，則禹舜立即來到，帝王的基業立即興起。又表示持續，相當於「仍然」。唐杜甫〈泛江〉：「亂離還奏樂，飄泊且聽歌。」意謂在時局離亂之時仍然奏起音樂，飄泊流離之時尚在聽歌。又表示選擇，相當於「還是」。

　　甲骨文用作本義，《合集》6349：「工方還。」表示工方的人回來。

　　金文用作本義，呂行壼：「白（伯）懋父北征，唯還。」意指伯懋父征伐北方，回來了。又作環繞義。散氏盤：「道以東一奉（封），還，以西一奉（封）。」道路向東為邊界，還繞一周，又向西為邊界。又用為人名，鯀還鼎：「鯀還作寶用鼎。」「鯀還」是人名，表示鯀還鑄造了寶貴的鼎。

　　戰國竹簡借「還」為「懷」。《郭店簡．尊德義》簡25：「治民非還（懷）生而已也。」「懷生」即安於生計；這句指治理百姓不只是使他們安於生計。

　　漢帛書借「還」為「環」，作環繞之意。《馬王堆．五十二病方》第101行：「取井中泥，以還（環）封其傷。」即是用井中的泥土，包圍傷口。

　　雖然「還」字早已見於金文，但漢帛書仍多見借「環」為「還」，用作本義。《馬王堆帛書．春秋事語》第52行：「獻公之帀（師）襲郭（虢）環（還）。」意指晉獻公的軍隊攻打虢國後回來了。又用作轉移義。《馬王堆帛書．戰國縱橫家書》第278行：「餘（與）燕為上交，秦禍案環（還）歸於趙矣。」意謂（秦國）與燕國成為友好之國，秦國把禍患轉移給趙國。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「行」從「目」從「方」；金文、小篆從「辵」，「睘」聲。本義是返回、歸還。後又引申為退還、恢復等義。「還」亦常用作副詞，表示立即、仍然、還是等義。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
還 (Simplified: 还)
Total strokes: 17; Radical: 辵
Character Formation:
  • ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 睘 [ qióng ] round; to stare
Antonyms: 去
  • Pinyin: hái

    English Definition: still; still in progress; still more; yet; even more; in addition; fairly; passably (good); as early as; even; also; else
    Example Words:
    還是 [ hái shi ]: or; still; nevertheless; had better
    還有 [ hái yǒu ]: furthermore; in addition; still; also
    還好 [ hái hǎo ]: not bad; tolerable; fortunately
    More: 還* | *還 | *還*
  • Pinyin: huán

    English Definition: to pay back; to return
    Example Words:
    還原 [ huán yuán ]: to restore to the original state; to reconstruct (an event); reduction (chemistry)
    More: 還* | *還 | *還*
hanziyuan:
Traditional in your browser 繁体字的浏览器显示:還

Traditional in Unicode standard 繁体字的Unicode标准:U+9084

Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: 𨘣

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:还

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+8FD8

Main pronunciation 主要发音: hái-huán

Other pronunciations 其它发音: fú,huán,hái

Original meaning 本义: Meaning still, return.

English senses 英语理解: still, yet, also, besides

Usage example 用法举例: 還有 hái yǒu (in addition)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 87

Shuowen 说文解字: 復也從辵瞏聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 還 𨘣 from road-and-foot 辶辶辵 chuò and (rem- 不 bù) from phonetic round-bi 睘瞏 huán A098 还[還] simp 还.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :

Simplification rule : A098 还[還]

Simplification rule explained :
existing-char cursive 不睘 还還 (to repeat)

Variant rule : C000

Variant rule clarification :

Applied rules :

New font rule :

There is no known oracle characters found. 没.

Seal characters (1)

還是 [ hái shi ]: or; still; nevertheless; had better
還有 [ hái yǒu ]: furthermore; in addition; still; also
還好 [ hái hǎo ]: not bad; tolerable; fortunately
①回到原處或恢復原狀：還鄉。還俗。衣錦還鄉。返老還童。
②回報別人對自己的行動。還手。還擊。以眼還眼。以牙還牙。
③償付：歸還。償還。還本。原物奉還。
④古同“環”，環繞。
⑤姓氏。

還暦(かんれき): 60th birthday
返還(へんかん): return, restoration

甲骨文從「 行 」從「 目 」從「 方 」，周原甲骨文從「 彳 」，「 睘 」聲，與金文形異。金文從「 辵 」，「 睘 」聲，「 睘 」兼作形符，「 睘 」本義為圓形的玉璧，因而引申有歸回之意，「 辵 」即行走，故「 還 」有返回、歸還之意。金文與小篆、簡帛字形相同。 本義為返回、回歸。《說文》：「還，復也。从辵，睘聲。」《爾雅．釋言》：「還、復，返也。」邢昺注：「皆迴返也。」《廣雅．釋詁二》：「還，歸也。」《詩經．小雅．何人斯》：「爾還而入，我心易也。還而不入，否難知也。」鄭玄注：「還，行返也。」這幾句詩指你歸來時進來看我，我的心就歡喜了；你歸來但不來看我，原因沒有人知道。晉陶淵明〈歸去來辭〉：「鳥倦飛而知還。」意謂雀鳥困倦了就知道要飛回自己的巢。此為成語「倦鳥知還」的出處，用以比喻辭官後歸隱田園或從旅居之地返回故鄉。從返回義引申為交還物件。《周禮．秋官．司儀》：「致饔餼，還圭。」鄭玄注引鄭司農云：「還圭，歸其玉也。」「饔餼」是古代諸侯行聘禮時接待賓客的大禮，多為贈送食物；這句指接受了食物，交還玉璧。又引申為恢復、還原之意。《明史．太祖紀二》：「吏以過誤罷者還其職。」意指若官吏被以為有過錯而遭罷職，恢復原來的官職。亦引申有退回、後退之意。《史記．高祖本紀》：「乃封秦重寶財物府庫，還軍霸上。」表示（劉邦）於是封閉秦國的貴重寶物、財物府庫，把軍隊退到霸上駐紮。 「 還 」亦解作環繞。段玉裁注《說文》：「還，今人還繞字用『環』，古經傳祇用『還』字。」《左傳．襄公十年》：「諸侯之師還鄭而南，至於陽陵。」杜預注：「還，繞也。」指諸侯的軍隊圍繞鄭國向南前進，到達陽陵。《史記．刺客列傳》：「荊軻逐秦王，秦王還柱而走。」即荊軻追着秦王政，秦王政只得繞着柱子逃走。又解為旋轉。《漢書．爰盎鼂錯傳》：「如此而勸以厚賞，威以重罰，則前死不還踵矣。」顏師古注：「還，讀曰旋。旋踵，回旋其足也。」這句意謂這樣用厚賞勸導，以重罰威懾，那麼在死亡面前也不會轉身逃跑。 「 還 」又用作副詞，表示時間，相當於「立即」。《荀子．王霸》：「如是則禹舜還至，王業還起。」王念孫《荀子雜志》：「還至，即至也；還起，即起也。」意指如此，則禹舜立即來到，帝王的基業立即興起。又表示持續，相當於「仍然」。唐杜甫〈泛江〉：「亂離還奏樂，飄泊且聽歌。」意謂在時局離亂之時仍然奏起音樂，飄泊流離之時尚在聽歌。又表示選擇，相當於「還是」。 甲骨文用作本義，《合集》6349：「工方還。」表示工方的人回來。 金文用作本義，呂行壼：「白（伯）懋父北征，唯還。」意指伯懋父征伐北方，回來了。又作環繞義。散氏盤：「道以東一奉（封），還，以西一奉（封）。」道路向東為邊界，還繞一周，又向西為邊界。又用為人名，鯀還鼎：「鯀還作寶用鼎。」「鯀還」是人名，表示鯀還鑄造了寶貴的鼎。 戰國竹簡借「 還 」為「 懷 」。《郭店簡．尊德義》簡25：「治民非還（懷）生而已也。」「懷生」即安於生計；這句指治理百姓不只是使他們安於生計。 漢帛書借「 還 」為「 環 」，作環繞之意。《馬王堆．五十二病方》第101行：「取井中泥，以還（環）封其傷。」即是用井中的泥土，包圍傷口。 雖然「 還 」字早已見於金文，但漢帛書仍多見借「 環 」為「 還 」，用作本義。《馬王堆帛書．春秋事語》第52行：「獻公之帀（師）襲郭（虢）環（還）。」意指晉獻公的軍隊攻打虢國後回來了。又用作轉移義。《馬王堆帛書．戰國縱橫家書》第278行：「餘（與）燕為上交，秦禍案環（還）歸於趙矣。」意謂（秦國）與燕國成為友好之國，秦國把禍患轉移給趙國。
Oracle bone inscriptions from " Xing" from " 目" to " fang", Zhou Yuan Oracle bone inscriptions from " 彳", " 睘" sound, different from inscriptions on gold. Inscriptions from " Chuo", " Qiong" sound, " Qiong" doubles as a pictogram, " Qiong" original meaning circular Bi, which have extended return to Italy, " Chuo" That walk, it is " also" have returned, The meaning of return. Bronze script has the same shape as Xiaozhuan and Jiansi. The original meaning is return, return. "Said Wen": "Return, Fu Ye. Congruo, Suisheng." "Er Ya. "Explanation": "Return, restore, return." Xing Bing's note: "All return." "Guangya. Interpretation II": "Return, return." "Book of Songs. Xiaoya. "Who Ren Si": "You are still in, my heart is easy. If you are not in, it is difficult to know." Zheng Xuan's note: "Return, go back." These poems refer to you coming in to see me when you return, mine My heart rejoices; you come back but don't come to see me, no one knows the reason. Jin Tao Yuanming "Returning speech": "The bird is tired and flies and knows it." It means that when the bird is tired, it knows to fly back to its nest. This is the source of the idiom "the tired bird knows the return". The meaning of return is extended to return the object. "Zhou Li. Autumn official. "Master of Ceremony": "To the food, to return to Gui." Zheng Xuan's note quoted Zheng Sinong: "Return to Gui, to return to the jade." "Food" was a great gift for receiving guests when the ancient princes gave their betrothal gifts. Most of them were gifts of food. ; This sentence refers to accepting the food and returning the jade bi. It also means restoration and restoration. "History of Ming Dynasty. "Taizu Ji 2": "The official shall return to his post if he strikes by mistake." This means that if an official is dismissed because of a fault, the original official position shall be restored. It also means to return or retreat. "Historical Records. "Bonji of Gaozu": "It is to seal the treasures of Qin's treasure house and return it to the army." Said (Liu Bang) closed the valuable treasures and treasures of the Qin state and retreated the army to the overlord. " Also," also construed surround. Duan Yucai's comment on "Shuowen": "Hai, today people still use "Huan" around the word, but the ancient scriptures only use the word "Huan"." "Zuo Zhuan. "The Ten Years of Xianggong": "The division of the princes returned to Zheng and went south, as for Yangling." Du's note: "Return, go around." Refers to the princes' army marching southward around Zheng State and reaching Yangling. "Historical Records. "The Assassin's Biography": "Jing Ke chased the King of Qin, and the King of Qin went away on the pillar." That is, Jing Ke chased the King of Qin, who had to run away around the pillar. Resolved as rotation. "Han Shu. "The wrong biography of Yan Angpi": "If you persuade you to give a great reward, and a heavy punishment, you will die before you will not pay the heel." Yan Shi's ancient note: "Return, read the spin. Turn the heel, turn the foot." The sentence means that if you use generous rewards to persuade and deter with heavy punishments, you will not turn around and run away in the face of death. " Hai" is also used as an adverb to indicate time and is equivalent to "immediately." "Xunzi. "Wang Ba": "If Yu and Shun return, Wang Ye will return." Wang Niansun "Xunzi Magazine": "Return, that is to come; return, that is to rise." This means that Yu and Shun came immediately , The emperor’s foundation immediately rose. It also means to continue, which is equivalent to "still." Tang Dufu "Fanjiang": "Play music in chaos, drift and listen to songs." It means that music is still played when the current situation is chaotic, and the fashion of drifting and drifting is listening to songs. It also expresses choice, which is equivalent to "still". Oracle is used as the original meaning, "Compilation" 6349: "Working side pays back." It means that the workers of the working side are back. Bronze text is used as the original meaning, Lu Xingtai: "Bai (Bo) Mao's father will march north, but he will return." It means that Bo Mao's father returned from an expedition to the north. Also used as surrounding righteousness. Sanshi Pan: "The road has one bong (seal) to the east, and one bong (seal) to the west." The road is bounded to the east, making a circle and then to the west. It is also used as a person's name, and Gun Huan Ding: "Gun Huan is used as a treasure to use the Ding." "Gun Huan" is the name of a person, which means that Gun has also cast a valuable Ding. Warring States bamboo borrow " also" is " pregnant." "Guodian Jane. Respect Virtue and Righteousness, Jan 25: "Governing the people is not just about repaying (conceiving) one's livelihood." "Containing one's livelihood" means being content with livelihood; this sentence refers to governing the people not just to make them livelihood. Chinese silk book by " also" to " ring" is intended to surround the work. "Mawangdui. "Fifty-two sick prescriptions" line 101: "Take the mud from the well and seal the wound with the (ring)." That is, to surround the wound with the mud from the well. Although " also" the word has long been found in inscriptions, but still more common Chinese silk book by " ring" to " also" used the original meaning. "Mawangdui Silk Book. "Chunqiu Shiyu" line 52: "Xiangongzhishi (division) attacked Guo (Guo) ring (return)." It means that Jin Xiangong's army returned after attacking Guoguo. Also used as transfer meaning. "Mawangdui Silk Book. "Warring States Political Strategists" line 278: "Yu (and) Yan is turned in, and the Qin disaster case is returned (returned) to Zhao Xi." It means that (Qin) and Yan have become friendly countries, and Qin has transferred the disaster To Zhao Guo.

還字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huán］
［《廣韻》户關切，平删，匣。］
“環2”的被通假字。“睘2”的被通假字。“还1”的繁体字。
(1)返回。
(2)恢复；还复。
(3)来，到来。
(4)交还；归还。
(5)偿还；交付。
(6)回头。
(7)回报；回击。
(8)后退。
(9)罢歇；止息。
(10)环绕。
(11)包；保证。
(12)连词。表示假设关系，相当于“如其”，“假使”。
(13)通“營”。谋求。
(14)通“營”。惑乱。
[②]［xuán］
［《廣韻》似宣切，平仙，邪。］
“还2”的繁体字。
(1)旋转；回旋。
(2)迅速；立即。
(3)敏捷貌。
[③]［hái］
［《廣韻》户關切，平删，匣。］
“还3”的繁体字。
(1)表示现象继续存在或动作继续进行。相当于“仍旧”。
(2)表示转折，相当于“却”、“反而”。
(3)表示时间，相当于“已”、“已經”。
(4)表示重复，相当于“再”、“又”。
(5)表示程度，相当于“更

還字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　還； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1266第23
【唐韻】戸關切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】胡關切，?音環。【說文】復也。【玉篇】反也。【詩·小雅】爾還而入，我心易也。還而不入，否難知也。【註】反也。　又【正韻】退也，歸也。【儀禮·鄕飮酒禮】主人答拜還，賔拜辱。【註】還，猶退也。【前漢·高帝紀】還守豐。又【灌嬰傳】還定三秦。　又顧也。【左傳·昭二十年】無所還忌。【註】還，猶顧也。　又償也。【老子·道德經】以道佐人主者，不以兵强天下，其事好還。　又大還、小還，日至之名。【淮南子·天文訓】日至于鳥次，是謂小還。至于女紀，是謂大還。　又與環同。【前漢·食貨志】還廬樹桑。　又【廣韻】似宣切【集韻】【韻會】旬宣切，?音旋。與旋同。【禮·禮運】五行、四時、十二月，還相爲本也。【註】迭相終而還相始，如環無端也。　又【正韻】轉也。【禮·玉藻】周還中規，折還中矩。【註】周旋圓轉，折旋方轉也。　又便捷貌。【詩·齊風】子之還兮。　又速也，卽也。【前漢·董仲舒傳】此皆可使還至而立效者也。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡慣

Name meaning

huán, xuán, hái, huán
вм. 还
Radicals: 罒  (net, scooter, zombie)
Meaning Mnemonic
There's a scooter coming toward you with a net trapping a weird zombie on it. You don't want this here, so you decide to send back the zombie.
You want to send back this zombie the way it came. You definitely don't want it loose in your neighborhood.
Reading Mnemonic
As you prepare to send back the zombie, you imagine yourself as Genghis Khan (かん). On your horse (it's just your own scooter) you stab forward with your spear (stick), swing the scooter the zombie is on, and send it back from whence it came!
You managed to send back the zombie, good for you! Genghis Khan would be proud.
